## IPlotAPI interface

Fluent API for configuring the plot.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPlotAPI 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [chartType(chartType)](./plot.iplotapi.charttype.md) | Set the type of the chart to be plotted. |
|  [height(height)](./plot.iplotapi.height.md) | Set the height of the chart. |
|  [serialize()](./plot.iplotapi.serialize.md) | Serialize the plot definition so that it can be converted to JSON. The JSON definition of the chart can be used to instantiate the chart in a browser. |
|  [width(width)](./plot.iplotapi.width.md) | Set the width of the chart. |
|  [x()](./plot.iplotapi.x.md) | Configure the x axis. |
|  [y()](./plot.iplotapi.y.md) | Configure the y axis. |
|  [y2()](./plot.iplotapi.y2.md) | Configure the y axis. |
